title: Most people in game cannot connect.
body:
My friends and I trying to play ARURF, but we keep getting this message:
"Unable to connect to the server.  Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."
Tried restarting client, and it would not let us connect.  Only two of us could connect and apparently only one person on their team could.
Thanks for your help.  Servers seem to be acting strangely.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MooMilks,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=2HEEVGIJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:52:40.956+0000)
>
> **I'm having this problem right now too, I hope it's resolved soon. **
> {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
> 
> _Edit: Also, I would really like to not get a penalty for not being able to connect to my game due to a server issue. _

Same here friend, that is my main worry.  Maintaining my honorable status is important to both me and my account.

_The only time I get on these forums is when there's a problem. 
WELL RIOT, we're having a problem. Please fix. _

**I'm mad and I want to virtually fight people. **
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Just happened to me in my ranked game, everyone on our team dced when the others stayed in, they ended and we still lost LP nice thank you riot

> [{quoted}](name=Party G,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=2HEEVGIJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-27T22:54:01.042+0000)
>
> Just happened to me in my ranked game, everyone on our team dced when the others stayed in, they ended and we still lost LP nice thank you riot

Yeah, that is so not fair.  Really hope you at least get that lp back man, if not more compensation.
ya, same here. And I got a D- after the game end

RESTART YOUR PC

  YOUR PC DIDNT OPEN UP LEAGUE OF LEGEND PROPERLY SO IT SAID THAT. PLEASE GOSH RESTART YOUR PC AND IT SHOULD FIX IT!
I had this problem and I fixed it using hextech repair tool - force repatch {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I had this issue when starting an aram.  It won't even go to the loading screen for me.
Happened to me everybody on my team and the enemy team left and I was very confused.
Only 1 person on our 5 man premade is connecting and he says only one on the other team is also connecting.
I'm also having the same problem.
